onboarding.loginPrompt: You're currently not authenticated, please log in to continue.
onboarding.errorDefaultMsg: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
onboarding.orgPickerPrompt: You're part of multiple organizations, please pick the organization that you currently want to access.

trial.createTrialTermsAcceptance: By creating a trial, I confirm that I have read and agree to the Colabri <1>Terms of Service</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>.
trial.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions
trial.trialRequiresValidationMessage1: Your trial has been successfully created! Please check your inbox for a 'Change Password' email to verify your email address and set your password. Be sure to check your spam/junk folder if you don't see them your inbox.
trial.trialRequiresValidationMessage2: Once that's done, you're all set to start exploring your Colabri trial!. We hope you enjoy it!
trial.trialCreatedMessage: Your trial has been successfully created! You can access your new Colabri trial. We hope you enjoy it!
trial.recaptchaError: reCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.

validation.companyNameLength: Company Name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.nameTaken: There is already an organization with this name

autosetup.title: Quick Setup
autosetup.intro: This wizard will help you to quickly setup up an initial minimal configuration for this Colabri setup. This is a fast and easy way to get started with Colabri. You can always modify or extend your configuration later from within the admin section.
autosetup.skipWarning: Are you sure you want to skip this? You will need to configure your setup from scratch yourself.
autosetup.noAdmin: You need to be an organization admin to perform the setup.

countries.title: Select Countries
countries.description: Choose the countries you're operating in.

products.title: Create Example Product
products.description: Specify a single product for which you want to manage the content in Colabri. Don't worry after the setup you can add more products.

placeholders.name: E.g.: Coca-Cola Zero Cherry - 12oz Sleek Cans
placeholders.gpcClass: E.g.: 50202300 - Non Alcoholic Beverages - Ready to Drink
placeholders.gpcBrick: E.g.: 10000201 - Drinks Flavoured - Ready to Drink

sheets.title: Create Example Sheet
sheets.description: Create a sample content sheet for the product you've just created.

summary.title: Setup Complete
summary.description: Your example sheet was created successfully! You can now start using Colabri!

autosetup.stepError: Error occurred while executing this step.

toolbar.manageDocumentTooltip: Manage permissions  and settings for this document
toolbar.removeLanguageConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the {{language}} language?
toolbar.removeLanguageConfirmGeneric: Are you sure you want to remove the selected language?

statementElementBlock.nonOrgLanguage: This language is not configured for your organization.

addModal.title: Add Languages
addModal.description: Select languages to add to this organization.

messages.deleteMissingId: Unable to delete country: missing identifier.

addModal.title: Add Countries
addModal.description: Select countries to add to this organization.
